description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Arcana Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Arcana Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcanistsM]{Arcanist's Magic Aura}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSilence000]{Silence}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResilientS]{Resilient Sphere}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTeleportat]{Teleportation Circle}
